column4: Hi i remember there was a way to see the path of the executable you were running for example i type java in bash, how do i know were the java bin is located?
also ls -l /path/given/by/which to check for symlinks and such, if you were that curiuos.
yes ive been messing around with different java jdk's and im trying to figure out if i have the correct javac in my path
i know java is working with oracle by 'java -version'
